name: MOSQUITO CAT
notes:
The MOSQUITO CAT is mostly seen in Australia.
Mark I is Cat rigged. 
Mark II is Sloop rigged.
Originally designed as a one person (on trapeze) cat rigged yacht. Later the jib and the second trapeze were added and the Mosquito became an easily converted one-person/two-person yacht able to be built at home by the amateur or by professional builders but not restricted to one manufacturer.

Mosquito Catamaran Association of South Australia.
